participant_2.background:
I play with my dogs to help me feel younger.
I'm not rich, but I'm working hard to provide for my family.
My appearance is not as important to me as my performance.
I would like to spend more time with my family, but I have been very busy with my show.
i have four cats.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
It is going well, school is going well and I am looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies.
Hobbies are great, what are you interested in?
I like watching tv and movies, music, and I grow my own vegetables.
Those are all great hobbies, I love watching tv and movies too. I also like playing with my dogs.
I love dogs, my wife and I have a dog named Buddy.
That's great, I have four cats.
Cats are great too, I love their personality.
Me too, they are so independent and playful.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially like classical music.
I love classical music too, it is so calming and relaxing.
Yes, it is. I also like listening to music while I work.
That is a great way to relax and focus on your work.
It is, I highly recommend it
